1.text: Draw a hopscotch design on the ground.

2.text: Throw a flat stone or similar object (small beanbag, shell, button, plastic toy) to land on square one.

3.text: Hop through the squares, skipping the one you have your marker on.

4.text: Pick up the marker on your way back.

5.text: Pass the marker on to the next person.

6.text: Change the shape of the hopscotch course.

7.text: Vary the size and shape of the squares.
